name: Lightsaber Simulator
description:
Light-What?

Lightsaber Simulator was a game made as an inside joke between the NA-Crew. Started as a joke, and turned out to be a REAL game. This game consists to be a generic game that makes a short simulation of a Star Wars weapon, specifically the Lightsaber.  This game is a parody of some Playstore mobile games that are made in 2 minutes or less, that with a simple tap, you can alternate the lightsaber's state between On/Off.
